name: Redcodex
tag_list: iphone-development, ipad-development, android-development, web-developmet, it-outsorcing, it-staffing
overview:
Redcodex is a young innovative IT outsourcing company specializing in nearshore and offshore software development in Eastern Europe, Ukraine.. We do not only follow the traditional IT outsourcing model of project-based services, we also offer our clients to establish their OWN DEVELOPMENT TEAM in our development center or to outsource, completely or partially, their software development. This is equivalent to having your in-house IT specialists, but for a significantly lower cost and with less administrative nuisances.

Redcodex clients can gain control over their IT processes and systems and get more value from the resources they already have. We surround each client team with knowledge sharing activities to foster a profitable and productive work environment during their entire outsourcing experience, including social events, strong infrastructure, financial and administrative support, Q & A and Agile, Business and DevOps consulting services.

Together our team has successfully completed over 100 projects for various clients around the world. If you can dream it, our team will certainly make it happen.With experience in most any real world web development situations, our team is always thinking outside of the box to come with solutions to a wide array of projects.
